AbsenceOfInformationMappingsIpsToSnomedCt (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ConceptMap/absence-to-snomed-uv-ips)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/CodeSystem/absent-unknown-uv-ips to http://snomed.info/sct

ACTIVE. Published on 2022-11-22 03:24:39+0000 by Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group (http://www.hl7.org/Special/com...).

Absence of Information Mappings - IPS to SNOMED CT


Group 1Mapping from Absent and Unknown Data - IPS to SNOMED CT (all versions)
